channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 六对夫妇起诉日本政府，要求获得婚后使用不同姓氏的权利。
item.description:
Six couples are suing the Japanese government seeking the right to use different surnames after marriage, filing the case to coincide with International Women's Day.

Since the 19th century, married couples must choose the husband's or the wife's namehttps://t.co/axlHAi8AIh pic.twitter.com/BGKpVup979

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 流亡藏人保护遗产免遭 "文化灭绝""从教授传统工艺到编纂语言目录，流亡藏人守护着大多数人从未见过也不敢到访的故乡的文化，他们说中国正在消灭他们的遗产...
item.description:
Exiled Tibetans guard heritage from 'cultural genocide'

From teaching traditional crafts to cataloguing their language, exiled Tibetans guard the culture of a homeland most have neither seen nor dare visit, and where they say China is eradicating their heritage… pic.twitter.com/pYznZDA02E

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 香港新国家安全法草案包括对某些罪行判处终身监禁。新法涉及叛国、叛乱、外部干涉等罪行。"煽动叛乱 "现在包括煽动对中国共产党领导和社会主义制度的仇恨...
item.description:
Hong Kong draft new national security law includes life sentences for some offences.

The new law covers treason, insurrection, external interference, among others. "Sedition" now includes inciting hatred against China's Communist leadership and socialist system… pic.twitter.com/KEiFu1Rhh8

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在南非干旱的西开普省，环保组织 "Jobs 4 Carbon "正在种植一种灌木--spekboom，希望它能恢复该地区退化的土壤。这种红茎灌木过去曾主宰着...
item.description:
VIDEO: South Africa's carbon-trapping spekboom making a comeback.

In South Africa's arid Western Cape, the environmental organisation Jobs 4 Carbon is planting spekboom, a shrub that it hopes will rehabilitate the area's degraded soil. The red-stemmed bush used to dominate the… pic.twitter.com/rToDTvdNlc

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: @AFP摄影师奥利维耶-莫林（Olivier Morin）在挪威罗弗敦群岛的梅尔沃尔（Maervoll）拍摄到北极光（Aurora Borealis）。
item.description:
Glowing skies.@AFP photographer Olivier Morin captures the northern lights (Aurora Borealis) in Maervoll on Norway's Lofoten Islands

The natural illuminations are caused by interactions between solar winds and the Earth's magnetic field pic.twitter.com/G7p2MwY20D

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 视频： 伦敦开始寻找最优秀的地铁巴士艺人。自 19 世纪科维德大流行以来，伦敦地铁首次举办选拔赛，挑选最优秀的巴士艺人在每天有 350 万乘客的城市交通网中表演。伦敦地铁每天有 350 万乘客。
item.description:
VIDEO: London launches search for best underground buskers.

For the first time since the Covid-19 pandemic, the London Underground is holding auditions to select the best buskers to perform across the city's transport network, which sees 3.5 million users daily. From a total of… pic.twitter.com/ll5Ol7RZ8I

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: #以色列军方周五表示，在对哈马斯称因人群冲向援助车队而造成 115 名巴勒斯坦人死亡的事件进行审查后发现，部队向接近的嫌疑人 "准确地 "开火（死亡人数从 104 人增至 115 人--早前的帖子将...
item.description:
#CORRECTION #BREAKING The Israeli military said Friday a review of an incident that according to Hamas left 115 Palestinians dead as crowds rushed an aid convoy found that troops "fired precisely" at approaching suspects

(Changes death toll from 104 to 115 - earlier post will… pic.twitter.com/41HlELEf67

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 女性外阴残割："这是控制女孩的一种方式 "联合国儿童基金会的报告显示，自 2016 年以来，全球女性外阴残割的人数增加了 15%。
item.description:
FGM: "It's a way of controlling girls"

Female genital mutilation around the world has risen 15% since 2016.

Over 230 million girls and women alive today have suffered from the practice, UNICEF report shows
https://t.co/thfWC3l8D7 pic.twitter.com/k57w2ZNpQx

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 美国总统乔-拜登警告以色列不能将援助作为打击哈马斯的 "筹码 "拜登呼吁立即在加沙实行临时停火，那里的饥荒恐慌已成倍增加
item.description:
US President Joe Biden warns Israel that it cannot use aid as a "bargaining chip" in its fight against Hamas

Biden calls for an immediate temporary ceasefire in Gaza, where fears of a famine have multipliedhttps://t.co/wdL3mODryp pic.twitter.com/6DdMaQO3Xm

item.title: 彩虹天主教徒墨西哥教堂欢迎 #LGBTQ 群体 作为一名青少年，维克多-罗德里格斯（Victor Rodriguez）曾因自己是同性恋而感到被宗教排斥。
item.description:
'Rainbow Catholics': Mexican church welcomes #LGBTQ community

As a teenager, Victor Rodriguez felt excluded from his religion for being gay, now he's welcome at a church in Mexico City where same-sex couples are receiving blessings with the pope's endorsement… pic.twitter.com/iFJV77VvoG

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚大堡礁正遭受 "大规模白化事件"。海洋变暖正威胁着数以千计依赖大堡礁生存的海洋物种--大堡礁是一片长达 2,300 公里（1,400 英里）的热带珊瑚礁，其中蕴藏着令人惊叹的生物多样性。
item.description:
Australia's Great Barrier Reef in grip of 'mass bleaching event'.

Warming seas are threatening thousands of marine species dependent on the reef - a 2,300 kilometre (1,400 mile) expanse of tropical corals that house a stunning array of biodiversityhttps://t.co/b1fMzrphZ2 pic.twitter.com/KaPNMoQJCV

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 数以千计的猎犬涌向伯明翰国家展览中心，参加为期四天的克鲁夫斯犬展（Crufts）。
item.description:
Release the hounds: hunt begins for UK show's top dog.

Thousands of hounds have flocked to the National Exhibition Centre in Birmingham for the start of Crufts, the four-day dog show that attracts owners from across the globehttps://t.co/LuyvLTtu81 pic.twitter.com/3B00A39fF5

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: #美国总统拜登对特朗普发起猛烈抨击，称他 "危险"，并指责他向俄罗斯 "低头"。拜登说，他希望唤醒国会，让美国人警惕 "自由和民主正在受到攻击 "的危险...
item.description:
#UPDATE State of the Union.

President Biden launched a scorching attack on Trump calling him "dangerous" and accusing him of "bowing down" to Russia. Biden said he wants to wake up Congress and alert Americans to the danger that "freedom and democracy are under attack"… pic.twitter.com/g9BH6MsB16

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: #国情咨文： 美国总统乔-拜登警告以色列不能将援助作为 "讨价还价的筹码"，同时呼吁在血腥的加沙战争中立即与哈马斯实现临时停火
item.description:
#BREAKING State of the Union: US President Joe Biden warned Israel that it cannot use aid as a "bargaining chip" as he issued a call for an immediate, temporary ceasefire with Hamas in the bloody Gaza war pic.twitter.com/gQJ6caXs4T

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 视频： 美国总统乔-拜登在国情咨文中表示，如果美国向基辅提供 "自卫所需的武器"，乌克兰就有能力阻止普京。
item.description:
VIDEO: US President Joe Biden says during his State of the Union address that Ukraine is capable of stopping Putin if the US provides Kyiv the "weapons it needs to defend itself" pic.twitter.com/ThJtXxKQKA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: "不要让加沙挨饿！"以色列活动人士试图向加沙运送粮食援助，以示对巴勒斯坦人的支持。警察将其拒之门外。组织者说，这样做的目的是为了表明 "我们的社会中有人认为在加沙发生的事情是不可接受的"。
item.description:
"Don't starve Gaza!"

Israeli activists try to deliver food aid to Gaza in a show of support for Palestinians. Police turned it back. The aim was to show "there are people in our society who feel what is happening in Gaza is unacceptable", organisers said https://t.co/AVVD9ArMpF pic.twitter.com/CUGConLfX3

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 据《纽约时报》报道，鲁珀特-默多克（Rupert Murdoch）再次订婚了--享年 92 岁。默多克宣布，他计划于 6 月与女友埃琳娜-朱科娃（Elena Zhukova）举行婚礼。默多克曾四次结婚
item.description:
Rupert Murdoch is engaged once again -- at 92.

Murdoch announced he plans to wed his girlfriend, Elena Zhukova, in June, The New York Times reports. Murdoch has been married four times beforehttps://t.co/mMnpTyo2R0 pic.twitter.com/CIgznnlLuu

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）将在国情咨文中抨击竞选对手唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）策划 "报复和报应"，同时向持怀疑态度的选民提出自己对美国卷土重来的乐观看法。
item.description:
US President Joe Biden is set to use his State of the Union address to attack election rival Donald Trump for plotting "revenge and retribution," while offering skeptical voters his own optimistic version of an American comeback https://t.co/BANs6tcKwb

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚大堡礁当局表示，由于海洋变暖使珊瑚面临压力，一场 "大规模白化事件 "正在大堡礁上演。
item.description:
A "mass bleaching event" is unfolding at Australia's Great Barrier Reef, authorities there said, as warming seas put corals under stress. https://t.co/rt2MkqXCFN pic.twitter.com/le1QEEF0Vf

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: #由于混乱的帮派暴力席卷了这个加勒比国家，海地的主要港口周四被迫关闭。
item.description:
#UPDATE Haiti's main port was forced to close Thursday as chaotic gang violence engulfed the Caribbean nation.

The United States urged the absent Haitian prime minister to enact an "urgent" political transition https://t.co/H69g09wkC4 pic.twitter.com/unGnkLLVuG

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在吉尔吉斯斯坦的天山山脉，村民们制作了一个人工冰川，为干旱的农场提供用水。
item.description:
In the Tian-Shan mountains of Kyrgyzstan, villagers have made an artificial glacier to provide water for their drought-hit farms.

Residents made it over a period of two weeks in autumn by redirecting water from the peaks of 4,000-meter tall mountains https://t.co/kEHakV5qn1 pic.twitter.com/sY8xE7dzfC

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在葡萄牙西南部的乡村小镇圣特奥托尼奥，印度和尼泊尔餐馆比葡萄牙餐馆还多。
item.description:
In Sao Teotonio, a small country town in southwest Portugal, there are more Indian and Nepalese restaurants than Portuguese ones.

It makes sense when you discover South Asian workers keep the fruit farms that are the mainstay of this region going https://t.co/JQf93pwYxZ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: #澳大利亚大堡礁正在发生 "大规模白化事件"：管理局
item.description:
#BREAKING 'Mass bleaching event' under way at Australia's Great Barrier Reef: Authority pic.twitter.com/vC2fHkqryg

item.title: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙的一位特使表示，法国将在军政府统治下的乍得继续驻军，因为在与其他军事政权发生危机后，法国将撤退到非洲其他地方。
item.description:
France will keep troops in junta-run Chad as it retreats elsewhere in Africa following crises with other military regimes, an envoy for French President Emmanuel Macron said https://t.co/9bhov1E3OE pic.twitter.com/oC5tEAvqSh

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 到 20 世纪 70 年代，澳大利亚北部地区约 98% 的野生咸水鳄鱼数量已经消失。现在，有超过 10 万条 "咸水鳄 "在澳大利亚的海岸和湿地捕食。
item.description:
By the 1970s, some 98 percent of the wild saltwater crocodile population had disappeared in Australia's Northern Territory.

Now, over 100,000 "salties," which can grow over six meters long and weigh more 2,200 pounds, hunt along its coasts and wetlands https://t.co/vs3Eo8dzXk pic.twitter.com/oxNaZqvlRt

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 当世界上第一颗原子弹在距离他家门口 25 英里的地方爆炸时，韦斯利-伯里斯正在床上熟睡。
item.description:
Wesley Burris was fast asleep in bed when the world's first atomic bomb exploded just 25 miles from his front door.

Ignored by "Oppenheimer," atomic test victims are speaking out https://t.co/viWwbixO0J pic.twitter.com/99aRqoW1HB

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: #BREAKING Haiti requires 'global response' like Gaza, Ukraine：美国官员
item.description:
#BREAKING Haiti requires 'global response' like Gaza, Ukraine: US official pic.twitter.com/zJX0DbFyPq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 乌克兰任命瓦列里-扎卢日尼（Valery Zaluzhny）为新任驻英国特使，这是他被解除国家总司令职务一个月后的事。
item.description:
Ukraine has named Valery Zaluzhny as its new envoy to the UK, a month after he was removed from his position as the country's commander-in-chief https://t.co/TKEKnWBWC7

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 在印度海得拉巴的拉德巴扎市场，一名售货员正在查看一排漆手镯。#AFP 📸@noahseelam
item.description:
A salesman looks at a row of lacquered bangles at the Lad Bazaar market in Hyderabad, India. #AFP

item.title: 塞内加尔有望于 3 月 24 日举行大选--结束因即将卸任的总统麦基-萨勒推迟投票而引发的数周危机
item.description:
Senegal looks set to hold elections on March 24 — ending weeks of crisis triggered by outgoing President Macky Sall's delay of the poll https://t.co/36tDpdHWCT pic.twitter.com/OsYT8krP2c

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024
